The '''Valentine Cape''' was a personal [[cape]] that was briefly given to two players.

== Distribution ==
This cape was given to LolFoxy2 by a Mojang employee, Ekkelangelo<ref>{{Citation|url=https://laby.net/cape/bfa8cc9d7af57fd856890af7c2bf2a4a|title=This cape was given to @LolFoxy2 by the Mojang employee @Ekkelangelo after resolving LolFoxy2's problems with Migration.|website=laby.net}}</ref> who started to become friends with LolFoxy2 and resolved their migration problems with their alternative account.<ref>https://i.imgur.com/ZgROuy8.png</ref> It was promptly removed twenty minutes later after discovering its rarity.

It was also given to the player JoinGrave, presumably by accident, and then removed two days later.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://laby.net/cape/bfa8cc9d7af57fd856890af7c2bf2a4a|title=On the 24th of January 2023 it was also discovered for a short time on the profile @JoinGrave.|website=laby.net}}</ref>
